articles.author: Erin Cunningham
articles.title: Covid-19 live updates: Brazil and India now worst-hit hotspots with record new cases and deaths - The Washington Post
articles.description: In the United States, some 30.8 million people have been infected by the virus. More than 558,000 Americans have died due to covid-19.
articles.content: Indias Prime Minister Narendra Modi received his second dose of coronavirus vaccine Thursday, posting a photo on Twitter from the vaccination site in New Delhi as daily case numbers hit a record high… [+1298 chars]

articles.title: ‘It has never been more pertinent’ – Margaret Atwood on the chilling genius of Laurie Anderson’s Big Science - The Guardian
articles.description: The seminal album, with its extraordinary hit single O Superman, was unlike anything the writer had ever heard. As Bad Science returns, Atwood pays tribute to its prophetic dissection of 80s America

articles.title: Biden's plan to overhaul tax code would close offshore tax loopholes - NBC News
articles.description: President Joe Biden’s ambitious tax plan aims to rectify “shortcomings" and will be more fair for middle-class Americans, the president said Wednesday.
articles.content: President Joe Bidens tax plan would hike the corporate tax rate to bring in $2.5 trillion over 15 years to fund the sweeping $2 trillion infrastructure proposal unveiled last week, according to detai… [+6157 chars]
